page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: { { Mixed farming { }Nearly all the farms in the area are large mixed farms. They have dairy herds and provide most of their winter food. Most farmers also grow some root crops as well. Many of the farms are recorded in the Domesday Book 1086. {Specialist farms Some farmers have decided to change from the normal routine for example Chiverstone Farm as well as having the usual crops,it is a stable for horses. Westlake Farm is a market garden centre which transports its flowers by train via Dawlish to London.
